ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Mean mean nasty Maestro
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Maestro is definitely harder than Innoruuk himself.  The problem is you have to get exeactly the right number and class of people for the fight.  Too few
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 11 Apr 2000 kim@... wrote:

> 3 seconds of getting him aggroed on them. Combined with his
> AE lifetap and buggy pathing, he was actually harder than
> Innoruuk (who is widely regarded as the most difficult
> god/dragon at the moment).
>

Maestro is definitely harder than Innoruuk himself. The problem
is you have to get exeactly the right number and class of people for the
fight. Too few your damage just isn't keep up with his melee + ae
lifetaps. Too many and you're no longer adding anything to the fight,
just more HP for him to gain when he lifetaps. My guild has fought the
current Maestro with Six Note + Evensong, and we were able to kill him
with 4 casualties, all melee.
I went oom at least 5 times during that fight. Medding up just
enough for a greater heal and tossing it on the lowest tank in the group.
But, in the end we were able to pull it off.

--
Miriana
Legions of Darkness
Innoruuk Server
